title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /invoice-financings/contracts/{contractId} endpoint"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /invoice-financings/contracts/{contractId})```. **FamilyType**: ```Direitos Credit√≥rios Descontados``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/474579114/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Direitos+Credit+rios+Descontados+-+v2.2.0), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /invoice-financings/contracts/\\{contractId\\} endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/data/v2/invoice-financings/contracts/{consentPactualId}/{pactualId}/{contractId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /invoice-financings/contracts/{contractId})```. **FamilyType**: ```Direitos Credit√≥rios Descontados``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/474579114/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Direitos+Credit+rios+Descontados+-+v2.2.0), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"contractId","description":"Identificador do contrato para todos os tipos de opera√ß√£o de cr√©dito.","schema":{"maxLength":100,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,99}$","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"pactualId","description":"The Data operation PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

Ou seja, todas as parcelas ter√£o o mesmo valor, desde a primeira at√© a √∫ltima. Nos primeiros pagamentos, a maior parte do valor da presta√ß√£o corresponde aos juros. Ao longo do tempo, a taxa de juros vai decrescendo. Como o valor da presta√ß√£o √© fixo, com o passar das parcelas, o valor de amortiza√ß√£o vai aumentando.\n- SAM (Sistema de Amortiza√ß√£o Misto) - Cada presta√ß√£o (pagamento) √© a m√©dia aritm√©tica das presta√ß√µes respectivas no Sistemas Price e no Sistema de Amortiza√ß√£o Constante (SAC).\n- SEM SISTEMA DE AMORTIZA√á√ÉO\n","enum":["SAC","PRICE","SAM","SEM_SISTEMA_AMORTIZACAO","OUTROS"],"type":"string","example":"SAC","title":"EnumContractAmortizationScheduled"},"amortizationScheduledAdditionalInfo":{"description":"Campo obrigat√≥rio para complementar a informa√ß√£o relativa √† amortiza√ß√£o quando selecionada a op√ß√£o OUTROS.\n","maxLength":200,"pattern":"[\\w\\W\\s]*","type":"string","example":"Informa√ß√µes complementares relativa √† amortiza√ß√£o do tipo 'OUTROS'"},"interestRates":{"description":"Objeto que traz o conjunto de informa√ß√µes necess√°rias para demonstrar a composi√ß√£o das taxas de juros remunerat√≥rios da Modalidade de cr√©dito.  \nCaso o contrato n√£o possua taxas de juros, deve ser compartilhada uma lista vazia. >
  
</StatusCodes>
